attributes.action: not continue with the national database information sharing proposed in the "Coroners and Justice Bill"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that the government bill to remove the safeguards protecting personal information held by the government on individuals is a step too far and should be dropped.

By sharing data information between government departments the government will use data for purposes other than those for which the date was collected.

Additionally new data will be created by amalgamating so much personal information.
